description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget for a user profile screen. It displays user info, allows editing of the full name, and provides options to save updates or logout.

classes.name: ProfileScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays and edits the user's profile information.

classes.name: _ProfileScreenState
classes.description: The state class managing the ProfileScreen widget's behavior and UI.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state, fetches user profile data when widget is first created.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes controllers when the widget is removed.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Handles saving the updated profile info to the backend through AuthProvider.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget UI, displaying user info, input fields, and action buttons.
